BudgetVM is celebrating their official launch with a launch promotion. We're offering HyperVM management panel, LXAdmin, and a free 20 GB rsync backup space.

Order URL: http://hostingforyou.co.uk/billing/signup.php?clienttype=15

Addons
Extra GB of backup: $0.17 cents per GB
Each IP: $1 monthly
10 GB HDD: $3 monthly per 10 GB
DirectAdmin: $10 monthly

cPanel is not currently supported.

Items of Interest
IRC is allowed, however, any privilidges will be revoked immediately upon an attack / abuse.
Adult is strictly forbidden.
Phone verification IS enabled. You must use a valid phone number.

Example: +1.5555555555 for US. Format is +countrycode.number. Must be a landline or order will not go through.

Have any questions? Submit a ticket! http://budgetvm.com/desk

To obtain the rsync backup space, please open a ticket at the helpdesk.
